column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: This  property  indicates  the  ON/OFF status.

column2: Set value of ventilation air flow rate
column3: Sets ventilation air flow rate level and ventilation air flow rate auto status. This property specifies ventilation air flow rate level (8-step).
column4: Ventilation air flow rate auto status = 0x41 Ventilation air flow rate level = 0x31.0x38
